attributes.review: This app is so glitchy, and took FOREVER to download. Very upsetting, and the graphics are NOT designed well at all?? Like why is it red, white, and blue when the President is orange 😡😡😡 not MY app.
attributes.title: HORRIBLE

attributes.review: as soon as i opened the app, my dog started barking for a week straight without stopping. my dog finally stopped barking and spoke just like donald trump. my dog is still talking like donald trump and is trying to convince me to go to rallies and to vote for him. i do not know what to do with my dog. truly a horrifying experience. i do not recommend this app.
attributes.title: horrible

attributes.review: took forever to download none of the features work and i got a VIRUS!! this is easily the worst app to get pls get anything else!!
attributes.title: worst app ever

attributes.review: Made my phone turn off and had to get another worst app ever
attributes.title: Glitch

attributes.review: Never in my 40 years of living have I been this disappointed
can’t believe this! The hacked my phone after i downloaded it. They said they are talking all my money and giving it to a small orange man.
attributes.title: GOT HACKED!!

attributes.review: I wish I could give this orange Cheeto a zero 🥳🧚‍♀️👁👄👁 reasons include from this app I experienced uncontrollable diarrhea and vomiting from have to see our presidents face  #allbirthdaysmatter 🥳🧚‍♀️👁👄👁
attributes.title: Ewwwww

attributes.review: This app might be one of the worst apps on the App Store. Donald Trump is a misogynistic racist, and this app represents his beliefs. This app is only spreading propaganda that enforces political power upon the people. I absolutely hate this app.
attributes.title: Worst App

attributes.review: Doesn’t work & it messed up my phone take this app down
attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.review: I admire the Cheeto😗 I love his corn on the cob hair🌽 his tan is superior and I will never be orange like him 🍊🧡 but this app is not too great! 🤭 it did terrible things to my phone just like how he messed up America😡
attributes.title: F*ck_trump
